column5: Located on reserve land near the St. Margaret estate. A common well used earlier. Water is collected in a small stock tank (1.2m x 1.2m x 1.2m) and distributed. Currently, only two families are getting water from this.

column5: Located on Delmar estate Middle Division. There are no big trees. A RRM collecting pit (L=4m, W=3.5m, D=3m) is built around the spring. Water is pumped from it and sent to the stock tanks and distributed for daily consumptions. Two 5000L Plastic tanks are used for stock tank. Aland of about 30 Perches. Boundaries are marked

column5: There is a filter system, but it does not filter the water due to lack of proper maintenance and there are two 1000L PVC stock tanks to store water. There is also an RRM stock tank which was previously used but is not being used to water leakage.  This water is brought to another GND.
column6: Repair and maintenance of pipe systems, RRM stock tank and filter system
